name: MCONNECT
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your home devices hands-free. Just say it, and MCONNECT will obey. There's no need to open the MCONNECT App to change or check the device's status, simply ask Alexa to do it.

To link the skill, you will need to provide the username and password to your MCONNECT account. You will then select the house on the account that you will be controlling. After that, run device discovery with Alexa, and your MCONNECT devices will appear, ready to control, in your Alexa app.

Here’s a step by step guide:
(1). Download our "MCONNECT" app in Google Play or iOS App Store;
(2). Launch the app and register a new account (or log in if you’re already registered);
(3). Turn on MCONNECT devices and connect them with “MCONNECT” app;
(4). Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app;
(5). Search the Alexa Skills directory for "MCONNECT";
(6). Click Enable skill of "MCONNECT", then input your account username, password on the linking page;
(7). Talk to Echo "Alexa, discover devices.”. Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
(8). Now all setup is done. Try talking to Echo to control your devices.

After linking the skill, you can say:

Lights or switches:
• Alexa, turn on the Kitchen light
• Alexa, turn off the Kitchen light
Blinds or shutters:
• Alexa, open the blind
• Alexa, close the blind
• Alexa, raise the blind
• Alexa, lower the blind
Scenes:
• Alexa turn on Good night
• Alexa enable Good night

More info: https://motorline.pt/en/product/mconnect/
